CODE COMPARATIVE TABLE - ORDINANCES
modified
This table gives the location within this Code of those ordinances adopted since the 1972 Code, as updated through January 25, 1988, which are included herein. Ordinances adopted prior to such date were incorporated into the 1972 Code, as supplemented. Ordinances adopted since January 25, 1988, and not listed herein, have been omitted as repealed, superseded or not of a general and permanent nature.
EXPAND
Ordinance

this Code
